mapper.update: update evaluate set mem_id = #{memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ste_id = #{steId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eva_service = #{evaService,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eva_skill = #{evaSkill,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eva_proquality = #{evaProquality,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eva_comment = #{evaComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, eva_agreestate = #{evaAgreestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eva_state = #{evaState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eva_createtime = #{evaCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eva_time = #{evaTime,jdbcType=DATE}, eva_evastate = #{evaEvastate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where eva_id = #{evaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select eva_id, mem_id, ste_id, eva_service, eva_skill, eva_proquality, eva_comment, eva_agreestate, eva_state, eva_createtime, eva_time, eva_evastate from evaluate where eva_id = #{evaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select eva_id, mem_id, ste_id, eva_service, eva_skill, eva_proquality, eva_comment, eva_agreestate, eva_state, eva_createtime, eva_time, eva_evastate from evaluate
